tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE reinforcement_learning_models (
    model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    model_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    performance_score FLOAT NOT NULL,
    training_time_hours FLOAT NOT NULL,
    validation_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE model_performance ( 
    model_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    model_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
    training_episodes INT NOT NULL, 
    validation_episodes INT NOT NULL, 
    training_time INTERVAL NOT NULL, 
    last_updated TIMESTAMP NOT NULL 
);

CREATE TABLE model_results ( 
    result_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    model_id INT NOT NULL, 
    test_episodes INT NOT NULL, 
    test_accuracy DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL, 
    test_loss DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL, 
    test_time INTERVAL NOT NULL, 
    test_date DATE NOT NULL 
);

CREATE TABLE performance (
    performance_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id UUID NOT NULL,
    performance_metric VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    performance_value FLOAT NOT NULL,
    recorded_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES models(model_id)
);

CREATE TABLE training_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id UUID NOT NULL,
    training_epoch INT NOT NULL,
    training_loss FLOAT NOT NULL,
    training_accuracy FLOAT NOT NULL,
    training_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES models(model_id)
);

CREATE TABLE model_performance (
    model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(255),
    training_episodes INT,
    training_time FLOAT,
    training_accuracy FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE episode_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT REFERENCES model_performance(model_id),
    episode_number INT,
    episode_reward FLOAT,
    episode_length INT
);

CREATE TABLE model_hyperparameters (
    hyperparams_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT REFERENCES model_performance(model_id),
    learning_rate FLOAT,
    batch_size INT,
    hidden_layers INT
);

CREATE TABLE ModelPerformance (
    model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(255),
    training_episodes INT,
    validation_episodes INT,
    training_time_hours FLOAT,
    validation_accuracy FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE TrainingLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    training_loss FLOAT,
    validation_loss FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE ModelArchitectures (
    architecture_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    architecture_name VARCHAR(255),
    layers INT,
    nodes_per_layer INT
);

CREATE TABLE EvaluationMetrics (
    evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    evaluation_date DATE,
    precision FLOAT,
    recall FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE HardwareResources (
    resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    resource_type VARCHAR(255),
    cpu_cores INT,
    gpu_memory_GB INT
);
